publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee.
S1M-286# Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife (lodged on 15 November 1999) Ben Wallace*

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace
S1M-286# Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife (lodged on 15 November 1999) Mr John Swinney*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-286# Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife (lodged on 15 November 1999) Brian Adam*
S1M-286# Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife (lodged on 15 November 1999) Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr David Davidson*, Shona Robison*

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Mr Andrew Welsh*

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Mr Andrew Welsh, Kate Maclean*
S1M-286# Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife (lodged on 15 November 1999) Irene McGugan*

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Mr Andrew Welsh, Kate Maclean, Irene McGugan
S1M-286# Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife (lodged on 15 November 1999) Nick Johnston*

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Mr Andrew Welsh, Kate Maclean, Irene McGugan, Nick Johnston

S1M-286# Mr John McAllion: Neurosurgical Services in Tayside and Fife—That the Parliament believes that neurological services, including neurosurgery, for Tayside and Fife should be retained and strengthened at Ninewells Hospital in Dundee. Supported by: Ben Wallace, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Adam, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Mr Andrew Welsh, Kate Maclean, Irene McGugan, Nick Johnston
